metadata.description: While on holiday in Brazil, the X-Man known as Wolverine has his motorcycle stolen by a group of young boys - one of whom has a secret. When a brutal gang kidnaps the boy, Logan sets off on a quest to find him - leading to a deadly encounter with a corrupt faith healer who may not be what he appears! WOLVERINE: SAUDADE is a vicious saga of bloody revenge as only Wolverine can deliver!
metadata.name: Wolverine: Saudade
